channel.title: Bow on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Bow on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Bow
item.description: When She kisses my moonlight, I hide in burrowed screams. And I, in my own light. Know Her sunbeams. My worthless plight of day. Her might of play. Taunting. The Earth bends below Her. It sings joyed terror. And I, in my dance. Lurch in acquiesce. Stupidity rinses my strength away. Down such a gloried fade. Days of promise seem so far away. No angels stand near. Knocks of wine. Colors spin so fine.
